ghostPost.title: Basics of Workbench
ghostPost.html:
Video Overview

Let’s take a quick look at Workbench, one of the most indispensable tools not just for administrators and developers of Salesforce, but also for end users!

Once you’re logged into salesforce, visit workbench.developerforce.com and click “Login with Salesforce”

Take some time to check this tool out. It’s very useful, particularly as a tab to keep open in the background to reference while you’re writing Apex code. Additionally, it’s very useful to use in place of the Data Loader, which I find very finnicky and less reliable.

Here’s what we cover in the video:

  • Object Describe
  • SOQL Query built with clicks
  • Exporting, Importing, Updating, etc. on bulk data
  • REST Endpoint Explorer

Thanks for watching!
